character.name: Maginot
character.desc:
<c=d5c58a>MAGINOT</c>
Your military advisor. His cards bring a lot of shield and midrow objects, with a dash of midrow ignoring weapons.

artilleryBank.name: Artillery Bank
artilleryBank.desc: After drawing cards at the start of each turn, draw <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=card>Artillery Shell</c>.

autoShield.name: Auto Shield
autoShield.desc: At the start of this ship's turn, gains <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

autoTempShield.name: Auto Temp.Shield
autoTempShield.desc: At the start of this ship's turn, gains <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

activeShielding.name: Active Shielding
activeShielding.desc: Gains 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> each time this ship is about to be hit. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

NastySurprise.title: Nasty Surprise
NastySurprise.description: Instantly turn every <c=midrow>object in the midrow</c> into <c=drone>mines</c>.

ArtilleryAttack.title: Artillery Attack
ArtilleryAttack.description: Attack that bypass <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> on its path. Bypassed <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> can't react to this attack.

description.None: Add three <c=card>Artillery Shell A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Add four <c=card>Artillery Shell A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.B: Add three <c=card>Artillery Shell A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c> and two to the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Artillery <c=keyword>{0}</c>. +1 for every time played this combat.
description.A:
Draw 1.
Artillery <c=keyword>{0}</c>. +1 for every time played this combat.
description.B: Artillery <c=keyword>{0}</c>. +2 for every time played this combat.

Pavis.name: Pavis
Pavis.description: Temporary Shield = total dmg of enemy's cannon attack: <c=keyword>{0}</c>.

BuriedKnowledge.name: BURIED KNOWLEDGE
BuriedKnowledge.desc: At the start of combat, add 3 <c=card>Ponder</c>s to the discard pile.

Lexicon.name: LEXICON
Lexicon.desc: Whenever you gain a <c=card>Ponder</c> during combat, it is given the A or B upgrade, alternating.
